cs.IT, cs.SI, cs.DS, cs.MM, cs.LG. 

The paper deals with source coding, which is a topic in information theory (cs.IT). The use of logarithmic loss is a common measure of distortion in information theory, and the paper specifically focuses on this measure, which suggests that it may fall under the sub-category of statistical inference (cs.SI). The paper also mentions the CEO problem, which is a well-known problem in distributed computing and falls under the sub-category of distributed systems (cs.DS). The paper provides examples and applications, which suggests that it may also fall under the sub-categories of multimedia (cs.MM) and machine learning (cs.LG).
